Detailed Description

An implementation of MurmurHash3, based heavily on the x64 128bit output implementation. MurmurHash3 is a public domain hashing algorithm written by Austin Appleby, ref http://code.google.com/p/smhasher/wiki/MurmurHash3.

MurmurHash3 is not cryptographically secure, however it has excellent collision resistance and is orders of magnitude faster than the fastest secure cryptographic hash.
